column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Saikhan says : " It was an honor serving under Chief Beifong for so many years and I wish her a speedy recovery .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Tarrlok , I do n't know what you did to get Chief Saikhan in your pocket but I highly doubt it was legal .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Oh , Tenzin .
#Text=Always the conspiracy theorist .
#Text=Did you ever consider Saikhan simply recognizes my talents and wants what is best for this city ?
#Text=Well , Avatar Korra .
#Text=Long time , no see .
#Text=Now that your little pro-bending distractions are over , I look forward to your return to my task force .
#Text=" Korra says : " Ha !
#Text=Forget it !
#Text=There 's no way I 'm rejoining your vanity project .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " That is unfortunate to hear , but I 'm sure you 'll come to your senses as you have in the past .
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't hold your breath , bub .
#Text=You know , Tenzin 's been right about you all along .
#Text=You played me , you played Beifong , and now you 're playing the new Chief too .
#Text=Well , I got news for you .
#Text=You need me , but I do n't need you .
#Text=I 'm the Avatar .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " You 're not , in fact , the Avatar .
#Text=You are merely a half - baked Avatar in training , which reminds me , how is your airbending going ?
#Text=Made any significant progress with that ?
#Text=I did n't think so .
#Text=If you will not be part of my task force , then you had best stay out of my way .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't understand what 's wrong with me .
#Text=I 've memorized nearly all of the practice forms , but I still ca n't produce a single measly puff of air !
#Text=I 'm a failure .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No you 're not .
#Text=You just need to work through this airbending block .
#Text=" Korra says : " Amazing advice .
#Text=I 'll get right on that .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I was n't finished yet .
#Text=You see , Aang not only had his bending teachers , but also his past lives to call upon for guidance .
#Text=Have you ever made contact with your past lives ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No , of course I have n't .
#Text=Did n't you get the memo from the White Lotus ?
#Text=I 'm a spiritual failure , too .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You may have made a connection without realizing it .
#Text=Perhaps something you mistook as a dream ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Maybe .
#Text=I had a few weird hallucinations , but I hardly even remember them .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " And did you see any previous Avatars in these visions ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I saw Aang .
#Text=It seemed like he was in trouble .
#Text=What do you think it means ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Hmm , I do n't know .
#Text=But I urge you to meditate on these visions .
#Text=I believe Aang 's spirit must be trying to tell you something .
#Text="
